metahash.title: Metahash
metahash.description: [Multihash](https://multiformats.io/multihash/) of the supplied metadata (default blake3). For deterministic results [JSC RFC5452](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8785) canonicalization is applied before hashing.

tophash.title: Tophash
tophash.description: [Multihash](https://multiformats.io/multihash/) of the concatenation (binding) of metahash and datahash (default blake3).

filename.title: Filename
filename.description:
Filename of the referenced **digital content** (automatically used as fallback if
the `name` field was not specified for ISCC processing)

filesize.title: Filesize
filesize.description: File size of media asset in number of bytes.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of audio-visual media in secondes.

fps.title: Fps
fps.description: Frames per second of video assets.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of visual media in number of pixels.

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of visual media in number of pixels.

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Number of text characters (code points after Unicode normalization)

pages.title: Pages
pages.description: Number of pages (for paged documents only)

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: List of keywords relevant to the identified digital content.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: JSON or JSON-LD formated values about the identified *digital content*. Compatible with [ERC-1155](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155).

content.title: Content
content.description: URI of the *digital content* that was used to create this ISCC.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Other identifier(s) referencing the work, product or other abstraction of which the referenced **digital content** is a full or partial manifestation.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

license.title: License
license.description: URI of license for the identified *digital content*.

redirect.title: Redirect
redirect.description: URL to which a resolver should redirect an ISCC-ID that has been minted from a declartion that includes the IPFS-hash of this metadata instance.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name or title of the intangible creation manifested by the idendified *digital content*.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the *digital content* identified by the **ISCC** (used as input for Meta-Code generation). Any user presentable text string (including Markdown text) indicative of the identity  of the referent may be used.
description.example: a 1984 fantasy film co-written and directed by *Wolfgang Petersen*

image.title: Image
image.description: URI for a user-presentable image that serves as a preview of the *digital content*. The URI may be a Data-URL [RFC2397](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc2397). If **ISCC** metadata is used as NFT metadata according to [ERC-721](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/standards/tokens/erc-721/) or [ERC-1155](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/standards/tokens/erc-1155/) the URI should reference the actual digital content represented by the NFT.

iscc.title: Iscc
iscc.description: **ISCC-CODE** in canonical representation. This is the minimal required field for a valid ISCC Metadata object.
